entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or periods of snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain changing to snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
